function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of highly contagious virus with high mortality rates.","Impact":"High mortality, overwhelmed healthcare system, economic downturn.","Mitigation":"Limit social contacts, emphasize personal hygiene, implement pandemic-related measures.","Technologies":"EnergyPlus software, data analytics, remote monitoring.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential workers.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, employers."}]}
